resources.string: Please choose from the gallery some images that you want to use in this app. Go back to the app if you do not want to add more images.
Select images that you want to remove from the list. Then press the trash icon to remove, or press the cross icon to abort.
Please select a name of at least one character.
The name “%1$s” already exists - please choose another one.
Please enter a name for the new list.
Please enter the new name of the list.
Please select the image list to which you want to switch.
Please select the image list which you want to delete.
Do you really want to delete the list “%1$s”?
